text: Abortion in Azerbaijan is legal upon request within the first twenty-eight weeks of pregnancy. After twenty-eight weeks, it is legal when: * The abortion will save the woman's life or preserve her health; * The father died during the pregnancy; * Either parent was imprisoned; * The pregnancy is a result of rape or incest; * There is a disability in the family; or * The parents have divorced. Additionally, a physician may approve any other reason to carry out an abortion. == References == Azerbijan Azerbaijan Category:Demographics of Azerbaijan
title: Abortion in Azerbaijan
